alert.note: Alert for Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 06 at 10:04AM MST until March 06 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 229 AND 230... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 229 and 230. * Winds...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher
